data.eml:eml: New World species of the genus Calliscelio Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae, Scelioninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Hua-yan, Masner, Lubomir, Johnson, Norman F. (2017): New World species of the genus Calliscelio Ashmead (Hymenoptera, Platygastridae, Scelioninae). ZooKeys 648: 1-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.648.10935, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.648.10935
